amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit any funding to manage recreational snowmobile use in Yellowstone and Grand Teton National Parks and the John D. Rockefeller, Jr.Memorial Parkway; except in accordance with national Park Service One-year Delay Rule published November 18, 2002.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section to the bill which prohibits use of funds to manage recreational snowmobile use in Yellowstone and Grand Teton National Parks and the John D. Rockefeller, Jr. Memorial Parkway except in accordance with National Park Service One-Year Delay Rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 210 (Roll no. 385).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Holt.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 210 (Roll no. 385).
